sentence.Network_en: He was a tall, lanky man with iron-grey hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个瘦高个子，一头铁灰色头发。

list.abs: a cheering crowd of lanky albinos ., 一群欢呼的瘦削白化病人.
second speaker is a lanky man in a well-pressed suit . he clears throat before speaking .第二个发言的人瘦而高，着一身笔挺西装，未出声先清嗓子。
she was transformed from a lanky adolescent into a willowy young woman .她从一个瘦削的少女变成一位苗条的少妇。
She is a lanky and unattractive girl ., 她是一个瘦长的不吸引人的女孩儿.

entry.tran: 瘦高挑的；瘦长而行动笨拙的
entry.def: If you describe someone as lanky, you mean that they are tall and thin and move rather awkwardly.

example.ex: He was six feet four, all lanky and leggy.
example.tran: 他身高6英尺4英寸，瘦高个儿，大长腿。

means.word_mean: 1. tall and thin and having long slender limbs;

sentences.sentence: "a lanky kid transformed almost overnight into a handsome young man"
